name: portal-theme
description: Build project for the DEMIS portal theme library

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:module
scripts.build:module: cp src/index.js dist/gematik/demis-portal-theme-library/ && cp src/index.d.ts dist/gematik/demis-portal-theme-library/ && cp src/package.json dist/gematik/demis-portal-theme-library/
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist/gematik/demis-portal-theme-library && npm pack && mv *.tgz ../../
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm pack dist/gematik/demis-portal-theme-library --pack-destination dist
